Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
The SELECT statement has no WHERE clause and could examine many more rows than intended

statements.sql: select `admin_users`.*, `roles`.`name` as `role_name` from `admin_users` left join `roles` on `admin_users`.`role_id` = `roles`.`id` where `email` = 'truongankhang@gmail.com' and `password` = '579646aad11fae4dd295812fb4526245' and `admin_users`.`status` = '1' limit 1
